summary:
### March 2025 Summary for buidlguidl/ens-pg

- **Major Features and Improvements:**
  - Implemented USDC grants functionality, including a dedicated apply page and detail page for users.
  - Updated the home page and My Grants page to include approved large grants.
  - Enhanced the UI with new styles for datepickers and buttons, improving overall user experience.

- **Bug Fixes:**
  - Resolved a hydration error in the admin proposal approval process.
  - Fixed color inconsistencies between GrantItem and LargeGrantItem components.

- **Overall Themes:**
  - Focus on enhancing the user interface and experience for grant applications.
  - Significant updates to support USDC grants, indicating a shift towards broader grant management capabilities.

topIssues.title: Small visual tweaks in Large grants detail page
Update grant details for large grant
GrantItem and LargeGrantItem have the circle indicator colors swapped
Apply to new stage for USDC grants
Decide and fix dates format across the app
Add USDC grants to all grants admin page
Large grant contract: allow stewards to change milestones data

topPRs.title: Fix hydration error on admin proposal can vote flag
Add USDC grants to admin All Grants page
Add large grants to My grants and add large grant detail page
Add approved large grants to home page
